name: HSP_ACCT_EBC
description: This table contains electronic birth certificate information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account with associated electronic birth certificate information.

columns.name: EBC_MOM_AGE
columns.description: The mother's age on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_MOM_RACE
columns.description: The mother's race on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_MOM_BIRTH_DT
columns.description: The mother's birthdate on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_DAD_AGE
columns.description: The father's age on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_DAD_RACE
columns.description: The father's race on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_DAD_BIRTH_DT
columns.description: The father's birthdate on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_BIRTH_WEIGHT
columns.description: The birth weight in grams of the child on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_PRV_BIRTHS_LIV
columns.description: Indicates the number of previous births that are now living

columns.name: EBC_PRV_BIRTHS_DEA
columns.description: Indicates the number of previous births that are now deceased.

columns.name: EBC_PRV_TERMINATES
columns.description: Indicates the number of previous terminations on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_LST_MENSES_DT
columns.description: This column stores the last normal menses date on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_PRENATL_VISITS
columns.description: Indicates the number of prenatal visits on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_APGAR_1MIN
columns.description: Indicates the Apgar value for 1 minute on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_APGAR_5MIN
columns.description: Indicates the Apgar value for 5 minutes on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_DT_LST_LIVBTH
columns.description: Indicates the date of the last live birth on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_DT_LST_TERMNTN
columns.description: Indicates the date of the last termination on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_GESTATNL_AGE
columns.description: The gestational age on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_CIGARETTES_DAY
columns.description: The average number of cigarettes per day on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_DRINKS_WEEKLY
columns.description: The average number of drinks per week on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_WT_GAINED_PREG
columns.description: Weight gained in pounds during the pregnancy on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_INFECTIOUS_DIS
columns.description: A description of infectious disease on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_MRN
columns.description: The medical record number on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_BIRTH_WT_LBSOZ
columns.description: The birth weight in pounds and ounces on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_BIRTH_HEIGHT
columns.description: The birth height in inches on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_COMMENTS_CMT
columns.description: Birth certificate comments on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_CHILD_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the child's sex on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account. Possible values are: 1-male, 2-female, or 9-unknown.

columns.name: EBC_BIRTH_INST_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the institution of birth on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_FACLTY_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the birth facility type on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account. 1-Hospital, 2-Freestanding Birthing Center, 3-Clinic, 4-Doctor's Office, 5-Nursing Home, 6-Retirement Home, 7-Hospice, 8-Residence, 9-Other

columns.name: EBC_ATTND_TITLE_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the attendant title on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account: 1-Dr of Medicine, 2-Dr of Osteopathy, 3-Certified Nurse Midwife, 4-Other Midwife, 5-Dr of Naturopathy, 6-Other, 8-Unstated, or 9-Unknown/Invalid.

columns.name: EBC_BIRTH_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the birth type on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.  1-Single, 2-Twin, 3-Triplet, 4-Quadruplet, 5-Quintuplet, 6-Siamese, 7-Other, 8-Unstated, 9-Unknown

columns.name: EBC_BIRTH_ORDER_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the birth order on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.  1-First, 2-Second, 3-Third, 4-Fourth, 5-Fifth, 6-Sixth, 7-Seventh, 8-Eighth, 9-Unknown

columns.name: EBC_PRENAT_BGN_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the month of pregnancy during which prenatal care began on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.  0-None, 1-1st Month, 2-2nd Month, 3-3rd Month, 4-4th Month,  5-5th Month, 6-6th Month, 7-7th Month, 8-8th Month, 9-9th Month, 10-Unstated/Unknown

columns.name: EBC_MOM_TRNS_FR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the institution the mother was transferred from on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_INF_TRNS_TO_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the institution the infant was transferred to on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_TOB_USE_YNU
columns.description: Indicates the if the mother used tobacco during the pregnancy on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account. 1-Yes, 2-No, 3-Unknown

columns.name: EBC_ALC_USE_YNU
columns.description: Indicates the if the mother used alcohol during the pregnancy on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account. 1-Yes, 2-No, 3-Unknown

columns.name: EBC_CH_BIRTH_DT_TM
columns.description: Indicates the date and time at which the newborn associated with the hospital account was delivered.
